page.title: 12PARADISE HOUSE(continued)
page.content: about four, with a member of staff. The rest of the students are sent either to work on the farm or to help cook lunch, or to help in the gardens. Because they do not have or want a television, in the evening they amuse themselves,either singing or playing an instrument. Some of the students are worried by anything out of the ordinary, so on Monday evenings they have a meeting where they explain what is happening that week. They are not allowed pets in the house, but there are two cats on the farm. They keep cows, sheep and grow vegetables, so they are almost self-sufficient. There is an Open Day, to raise money where things which the students have made are sold.Once, the leather workshop caught fire and the things made for Open Day were burnt.
